Description: The purpose of developing this storymap was to provide a detailed examination of air quality, starting with a broad view of the United States and then narrowing down to a more focused analysis of each county in North Carolina, all centered around the specific date of November 8th, 2023.

Setting: Daily PM2.5 Air Quality Forecast Across All US Counties on Nov 8 th, 2023
Description: In the graphic above, the map of the United States is depicted in the following numerical order: Good (1), Moderate (2), Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups (3), Unhealthy (4), Very Unhealthy (5), and Hazardous (6) are the classifications. I just plotted data on November 8.

Setting: Daily PM2.5 Air Quality Forecast Across All NC Counties on Nov 8 th, 2023
Description: In the graphic above, the map of the NC is depicted in the following numerical order: Good (1), Moderate (2), Unhealthy for Sensitive Groups (3), Unhealthy (4), Very Unhealthy (5), and Hazardous (6) are the classifications. I just plotted data on November 8.
